EmailTemplate.subject: Last chance to save money on your SpringOne Platform pass!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-last-price-cliff-2018]]> Join us September 24-27, 2018 in Washington, D.C. for SpringOne Platform 2018 <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-last-price-cliff-2018]]>. Engage with, and learn from, fellow developers, operators, architects, product managers, data scientists, executives, and all-around tech enthusiasts on the hottest trends in transformative software.
We’ve added a ton of new sessions and speakers <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/sessions?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-last-price-cliff-2018]]> to the agenda, from companies like T-Mobile, Cerner, StubHub, Google, Okta, CoreLogic, Microsoft, Mastercard, Scotiabank, Comcast, VMware, and many more! And you’ll hear main stage talks from Spring experts like Juergen Hoeller, Dave Syer, Mark Fisher, and Oliver Gierke. Also on the main stage are inspiring technologists such as:
- Ted Colbert, CIO and SVP of Information Technology & Data Analytics, The Boeing Company - Lauren Knausenberger, Director of Cyberspace Innovation, U.S. Air Force - Thomas Fredell, Chief Product Officer, Merrill Corporation
Save $200 if you register before July 31st 11:59pm Pacific, you will instantly save $200 USD off your ticket. Time is running out, so save now <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-last-price-cliff-2018]]>.
Submit Your 5-Minute Lightning Talk Do you have something you’ve wanted to share with your peers, but a 40 minute talk was just too long? Then lightning talks <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/lightning-talks?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-last-price-cliff-2018]]> are your chance to showcase your passions, tech knowledge, anything you feel would be compelling, to a lively audience.
You have five minutes to present. Build 20 slides that auto-advance every 15 seconds. Captivate us with your exposition. And that’s it. Please fill out the form <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/lightning-talks?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-last-price-cliff-2018]]> by Friday, August 17 (it’s short and sweet, we promise).
Stay Connected Join the conversation on Twitter #SpringOne <[[https://twitter.com/hashtag/SpringOne]]>, and follow @S1P <[[https://twitter.com/s1p]]> for news and updates.
We hope to see you there, Richard
